meanings.sent1: The stew had a muttony aroma that filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The chef's special sauce had a muttony flavor that delighted the guests.
meanings.sent3: The muttony smell from the farm made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a muttony appearance, with its worn-out walls.
meanings.sent5: The muttony texture of the fabric reminded her of cozy blankets.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or smell of mutton.
meanings.sent1: The soup had a muttony taste that reminded him of home.
meanings.sent2: The stew was so muttony that it made her mouth water.
meanings.sent3: The muttony aroma in the kitchen made the cat curious.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with a muttony scent that lingered in the room.
meanings.sent5: The muttony flavor of the dish brought back memories of family dinners.
